title: Project-Based Learning Model for Strengthening Biology-Based Entrepreneurial Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment using digital tools for experienced workplace professionals

learning_goals: Generate at least three startup ideas applying biological principles (genetics, microbiology, ecology, etc.)
Develop at least one prototype using Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology
Complete a startup business plan through the five stages of the ADDIE model: Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, and Evaluation
Propose biology-based product/service models applicable to real markets through team-based projects
Incorporate expert feedback at least twice during the learning process
Achieve over 80 points in entrepreneurial competencies (creativity, execution, sustainability) in the final evaluation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
